snippet.title: Minigame Madness - NEW Trailer! Wishlist Now!
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1408080?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=NewTrailer2

A new trailer for Minigame Madness! 😁 If you like what you see, please go add the game to your Steam wishlist. Thanks so much everyone! ♥️


Twitter - https://twitter.com/ChaoticDevs
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/BajtRQc
Website - https://MinigameMadness.net

Chaotic Entertainment is currently working on Minigame Madness, a frantic multiplayer party game for up to 16 players online. Compete with friends or strangers in a massive, ever-growing collection of fun and unique free-for-all minigames to earn awesome outfits and shiny badges!

Wishlist now! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1408080?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=NewTrailer2

Minigame Madness Promo - New Trailer
